page.title: 16RECREATION OF A 1st YR BOY
page.content: I am not particularly good at ordinary school sports but I feel that I am above average at the more unusual sports.Here are some examples of my hobbies and interests. CLUBS.I attend the Wednesday Club an informal school youth club and outside school I am a member of Scouts Watch(a nature club) and Followers a church youth club. HIKE CAMPING.Is my favourite outdoor sport.You need stamina and the right equipment which has to be carried in a ruck sack.I carry a 30 to 40 pound pack. CRAFTS.My main craft is aero-modelling.It is rewarding but difficult & expensive.The small but effective freeflight plane powered by a small diesel engine could cost Â£25.
